Dear ##NickName##,

Thanks for joining us for worship at Crosspoint! We're passionate about building a community where everyone can feel comfortable to come as they are, meet Christ, grow in their faith, and find a place to serve. 

To help fulfill that mission, we would love to hear any feedback from your experience with us. We ask if you would please complete this anonymous 60 second survey to help make our Guest experience more welcoming. 

I also understand you may have a few questions about your time at Crosspoint. If you would like to talk more, please let me know by replying to this email or calling 850-678-4411 during office hours.  You can always learn more about us at our website and connect with us on Facebook. 

I'd love to hear from you and can't wait to see you back at church tomorrow! We'll be meeting at 9:30 and 11:00 a.m. and the coffee will be hot. See you then!

Many Thanks,
